Description: Example 1
INPUT
{
  message: {
  battery: 92,
  temperature: 2176,
  humidity: 5.14,
  ec: 4353
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 92 },
  temperature: { unitId: 'Cel', record: 2176 },
  humidity: { unitId: '%RH', record: 5.14 },
  conductivity: { unitId: 'uS/cm', record: 4353 }
}
